Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, California 99th, Kedzie and 103rd due to street blockage near 103rd/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does  this affect my trip?

#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, California 99th, Kedzie, then will resume their normal route on 103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near 103rd/Sacramento.
